title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inputting a new Date() as content for three items, after saving and previewing, the data and text items display in the same format as expected. However, the dynamic text item shows the datetime value in a different format.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format for both the data/text item and the dynamic text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item.
2. Input new Date() as the content for all three items.
3. Save and preview the form.
